LanguageData.LactineHigh.label: 催乳劑亢奮
LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.0.label: low
LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.1.label: low

LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.3.label: low
LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.4.label: mild
LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.5.label: mild
LanguageData.LactineHigh.stages.6.label: high
LanguageData.LactineTolerance.label: 催乳劑耐受
LanguageData.LactineTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to lactine. The more severe this tolerance is, the more lactine it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.LactineAddiction.label: 催乳劑成癮
LanguageData.LactineAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to lactine. Long-term presence of lactine has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of lactine, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.LactineAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
